mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, B.LAST_MESSAGE, B.LAST_SEND_TIME, B.LAST_CM_IDX, B.LAST_READ, B.LAST_M_IDX FROM (SELECT CL.*, MR.NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME, MR.MEMBER_TYPE AS RECEIVER_TYPE FROM (SELECT C.*, M.NAME AS SENDER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TYPE AS SENDER_TYPE FROM D_CHATROOM C, D_MEMBER M WHERE C.SENDER = M.IDX(+)) CL, D_MEMBER MR WHERE CL.RECEIVER = MR.IDX(+)) A, (SELECT C_IDX, LAST_CM_IDX, LAST_MESSAGE, LAST_SEND_TIME, LAST_READ, LAST_M_IDX FROM (SELECT D_CHATROOM_IDX AS C_IDX, LAST_VALUE(IDX) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_CM_IDX, LAST_VALUE(MESSAGE) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_MESSAGE, LAST_VALUE(SEND_TIME) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_SEND_TIME, LAST_VALUE(READ) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_READ, LAST_VALUE(D_MEMBER_IDX) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_M_IDX FROM D_CHATMESSAGE) GROUP BY C_IDX, LAST_CM_IDX, LAST_MESSAGE, LAST_SEND_TIME, LAST_READ, LAST_M_IDX) B WHERE A.IDX = B.C_IDX ORDER BY LAST_CM_IDX DESC) WHERE SENDER = #{sessionIdx} OR RECEIVER = #{sessionIdx}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.IDX AS MESSAGE_IDX , A.MESSAGE , A.D_MEMBER_IDX , A.D_CHATROOM_IDX AS CHATROOM_IDX , A.SEND_TIME , A.READ , B.NAME , B.MEMBER_TYPE FROM D_CHATMESSAGE A, D_MEMBER B WHERE A.D_MEMBER_IDX = B.IDX) WHERE CHATROOM_IDX = #{roomIdx} ORDER BY MESSAGE_IDX ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_CHATMESSAGE ( IDX , MESSAGE , D_MEMBER_IDX , D_CHATROOM_IDX , SEND_TIME , READ ) VALUES ( D_CHATMESSAGE_IDX.NEXTVAL, /* IDX */ #{message}, /* MESSAGE */ #{d_member_idx}, /* D_MEMBER_IDX */ #{d_chatroom_idx}, /* D_CHATROOM_IDX */ #{send_time}, /* SEND_TIME */ 1 /* READ */ )
mapper.update: UPDATE D_CHATMESSAGE SET READ = 0 WHERE D_CHATROOM_IDX = #{roomIdx} AND D_MEMBER_IDX != #{sessionIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.*, B.LAST_MESSAGE, B.LAST_SEND_TIME, B.LAST_CM_IDX, B.LAST_READ, B.LAST_M_IDX FROM (SELECT CL.*, MR.NAME AS RECEIVER_NAME, MR.MEMBER_TYPE AS RECEIVER_TYPE FROM (SELECT C.*, M.NAME AS SENDER_NAME, M.MEMBER_TYPE AS SENDER_TYPE FROM D_CHATROOM C, D_MEMBER M WHERE C.SENDER = M.IDX(+)) CL, D_MEMBER MR WHERE CL.RECEIVER = MR.IDX(+)) A, (SELECT C_IDX, LAST_CM_IDX, LAST_MESSAGE, LAST_SEND_TIME, LAST_READ, LAST_M_IDX FROM (SELECT D_CHATROOM_IDX AS C_IDX, LAST_VALUE(IDX) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_CM_IDX, LAST_VALUE(MESSAGE) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_MESSAGE, LAST_VALUE(SEND_TIME) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_SEND_TIME, LAST_VALUE(READ) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_READ, LAST_VALUE(D_MEMBER_IDX) OVER(ORDER BY D_CHATROOM_IDX) AS LAST_M_IDX FROM D_CHATMESSAGE) GROUP BY C_IDX, LAST_CM_IDX, LAST_MESSAGE, LAST_SEND_TIME, LAST_READ, LAST_M_IDX) B WHERE A.IDX = B.C_IDX ORDER BY LAST_CM_IDX DESC) WHERE SENDER = #{sIdx} OR RECEIVER = #{sIdx}) WHERE LAST_READ = 1 AND LAST_M_IDX != #{sIdx}
